variants.Description in input context: Mutations in the N-terminus, C-terminus, and kinase domain of PINK1 were studied.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Cell Culture and Oxidative Stress Assay

Material used.Material Name: Stable human dopaminergic neuronal cell lines
Material used.Description: Stable human dopaminergic neuronal cell lines expressing normal and mutant PINK1 were generated and subjected to oxidative stress.

Readout description.Result Description: Apoptosis rates and mitochondrial membrane potential (Δψm) were measured under oxidative stress. Heterozygous and homozygous mutant cell lines showed increased apoptosis and decreased Δψm compared to wild-type controls.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1-expressing cell lines were used as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cell lines were used as negative controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal Δψm and apoptosis rates under oxidative stress are typically observed in wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant decreases in Δψm or increases in apoptosis rates compared to wild-type controls are considered abnormal.
